data.title: Chashma nuclear power plant
data.text:
Part of the

Global Nuclear Power Tracker,

a Global Energy Monitor project.

Other names: Chasnupp

Chashma nuclear power plant is an operating nuclear power plant in Punjab, Pakistan.

Project Details

Table 1: Unit-level project details for Chashma nuclear power plant

Unit name Status Commissioning year Nameplate capacity Reactor type Model Owner Operator 1 Operating[1] 2000[1] 325 MW[1] Pressurized water reactor[1] CNP-300[1] Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission [100%][1] Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission[1] 2 Operating[2] 2011[2] 325 MW[2] Pressurized water reactor[2] CNP-300[2] Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission [100%][2] Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission[2] 3 Operating[3] 2016[3] 340 MW[3] Pressurized water reactor[3] CNP-300[3] Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission [100%][3] Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission[3] 4 Operating[4] 2017[4] 340 MW[4] Pressurized water reactor[4] CNP-300[4] Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission [100%][4] Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission[4] 5 Pre-construction[5] – 1200 MW[6] Pressurized water reactor[7] Hualong One[5] – –
